name: Halo
instructions: Hold the KB by the horns upside down. Circle it around your head tightly, keeping your elbows close to your body.
tips: Keep your core tight and ribs down. Don't let your head bobble.

name: Slingshot
instructions: Pass the kettlebell around your body from hand to hand. Keep hips square and feet rooted.
tips: Arms should be long and loose. Do not twist your hips.

name: Goblet Squat
instructions: Hold the bell by the horns at chest level. Squat down, keeping your chest up and back straight.
tips: Push your knees out and drive through your heels.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Press the bell from the rack position straight up until the arm is locked out by your ear.
tips: Keep your glutes squeezed to protect your lower back. Do not lean back.

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Hinge at the hips, hike the bell back, and snap your hips forward to float the bell to chest height.
tips: It's a hinge, not a squat. Power comes from the glutes, not the shoulders.

name: One-Arm Swing
instructions: Perform a swing using only one arm. The free arm can swing outside or guard the chest.
tips: Keep your shoulders square. Fight the rotation.

name: Hand-to-Hand Swing
instructions: Perform a one-arm swing, but switch hands at the top of the float (weightless moment).
tips: Wait for the bell to float before switching. Ensure a secure grip before dropping.

name: Joint Rotation
instructions: Gently rotate ankles, knees, hips, shoulders, elbows, wrists, and neck.
tips: Smooth, controlled movements. No pain allowed.

name: World's Greatest Stretch
instructions: Lunge forward, place opposite hand on floor, rotate torso towards the front leg reaching up.
tips: Keep the back leg straight and active.

name: Cossack Squat
instructions: Shift weight to one side, squatting on that leg while keeping the other leg straight and heel on floor.
tips: Keep the heel of the squatting leg flat on the ground.

name: Plank Pullthrough
instructions: From a high plank, reach under your body with one hand to pull the KB from the opposite side to the outside.
tips: Keep hips completely still and square to the floor.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit on floor, lean back slightly, lift feet. Rotate torso moving the KB from side to side.
tips: Follow the weight with your eyes. Control the rotation.

name: Farmer's Walk
instructions: Hold a heavy weight in each hand (or one). Walk with a tall posture.
tips: Imagine a string pulling your head up. Don't let the weights bang your legs.

name: Rack Carry
instructions: Walk while holding the kettlebells in the rack position (hands by chin, elbows on ribs).
tips: Keep your chest up and breathe behind the shield (tight core).

name: Waiter's Walk
instructions: Walk with the kettlebell locked out overhead.
tips: Keep your arm vertical and shoulder packed down.

name: Push Press
instructions: Dip your knees slightly and drive up explosively to help press the bell overhead.
tips: Use your legs to generate the initial power. Lock out tight.

name: Front Squat
instructions: Squat with one or two kettlebells in the rack position.
tips: Elbows up! Don't let the weight pull you forward.

name: Glute Bridge
instructions: Lie on back, knees bent. Lift hips until body is straight from shoulders to knees.
tips: Squeeze glutes at the top. Don't hyperextend the lower back.

name: Reverse Lunge
instructions: Step backward and lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.
tips: Keep your front knee over your ankle. Torso upright.

name: Burpee
instructions: Drop to chest-to-floor, jump feet in, and jump up with a clap.
tips: Brace core when dropping to protect the spine.

name: Mountain Climber
instructions: High plank position. Drive knees to chest alternately at speed.
tips: Keep hips low and shoulders over wrists.

name: Row
instructions: Hinge forward. Pull the KB to your hip bone, retracting the shoulder blade.
tips: Keep back flat. Don't rotate the torso.

name: Floor Press
instructions: Lie on back. Press the bell from tricep-on-floor to full extension.
tips: Legs can be straight or bent. Keep elbows tucked 45 degrees.

name: Plank
instructions: Hold a straight body line on forearms and toes.
tips: Squeeze glutes and quads. Don't let hips sag.

name: Dead Bug
instructions: Lie on back, arms and legs up. Lower opposite arm and leg slowly.
tips: Keep lower back glued to the floor at all times.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Balance on one forearm and side of foot. Lift hips high.
tips: Straight line from head to heels.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Hinge hips back, grab handle, drive feet into floor to stand tall.
tips: Neutral spine. Shoulders higher than hips.

name: Clean
instructions: Swing the bell and zip it up tight to the body to land softly in the rack.
tips: Tame the arc. Elbow connects to ribs quickly.

name: Deep Squat Hold
instructions: Sit at the bottom of a squat. Relax and breathe.
tips: Keep heels down. Use weight as counterbalance if needed.

name: Push-up
instructions: Plank position. Lower chest to floor and press back up.
tips: Elbows at 45 degrees. Body moves as one unit.

name: Turkish Get Up
instructions: Stand up from lying down while keeping the weight locked overhead.
tips: Keep eyes on the bell. Move deliberately through each step.

name: Rack Squat
instructions: Squat with one kettlebell in the rack position.
tips: Fight the rotation. Keep torso vertical.

name: Suitcase Deadlift
instructions: Deadlift with the bell on the outside of one foot.
tips: Don't tilt sideways. Keep shoulders square.

name: Snatch
instructions: Explode the bell from hips to overhead in one fluid motion.
tips: Punch through at the top. Don't let it bang your wrist.

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Wide stance, toes out. Bell between legs. Deadlift mechanics.
tips: Knees track over toes. Chest stays tall.

name: Clean & Press
instructions: Clean the bell to rack, then Press it overhead.
tips: Pause briefly in the rack before pressing.

name: Bottom-Up Press
instructions: Press the bell holding it upside down (bottoms up).
tips: Crush grip the handle. Focus on stability.

name: Lunge
instructions: Standard lunge, can be forward or backward.
tips: Control the descent. Don't slam the knee.

name: Pistol Squat
instructions: One-legged squat with the other leg straight out in front.
tips: Use a box or suspension trainer if needed for balance.

name: Renegade Row
instructions: Push-up position holding KBs. Row one bell while pressing down on the other.
tips: Wide feet for stability. Do not twist hips.

name: Windmill
instructions: Weight overhead. Hinge at hips pushing butt towards the loaded side, reach opposite hand to floor.
tips: Keep the back leg straight. Look at the bell.

name: Pull-up
instructions: Hang from bar. Pull chest to bar.
tips: Depress shoulders away from ears.

name: Single Leg Deadlift
instructions: Hinge on one leg, lifting the other straight back like a lever.
tips: Hips square to floor. Soft bend in standing knee.

name: Figure 8
instructions: Pass the bell through legs in a figure-8 pattern.
tips: Keep chest up. Move fluidly.

name: Bottom-Up Push-up
instructions: Push-ups on the handles of kettlebells (or balancing on the ball if advanced).
tips: Extreme stability required. Be careful of wrists.

name: Lateral Lunge
instructions: Step to the side, squatting on that leg while keeping the other straight.
tips: Keep both heels down. Hips back.

name: Jump Squat
instructions: Squat down and explode up into a jump.
tips: Land softly (toe-ball-heel).

name: High Pull
instructions: Like a swing/clean but pull the elbow high and back at the top.
tips: Don't let the bell droop at the top. Powerful hips.

name: Hollow Hold
instructions: Balance on lower back, arms and legs extended and hovering.
tips: Lower back MUST touch floor. Crush your abs.

name: Clean & Jerk
instructions: Clean to rack, then Jerk (dip-drive-dip) overhead.
tips: Use legs for both parts of the movement.

name: Wall Sit
instructions: Sit against a wall with knees at 90 degrees.
tips: Press lower back into wall. Breathe.

name: Jerk
instructions: Dip legs, drive bell up, dip again to catch underneath.
tips: Fast elbows. Get under the weight.

name: Staggered Squat
instructions: Squat with one foot slightly behind (heel up), taking 20% of weight.
tips: Focus load on the front leg.

name: Thruster
instructions: Fluid combo of Squat and Press. Use squat rebound to launch weight.
tips: One motion. Don't stop at the rack.

name: Crush Curl
instructions: Bicep curl holding the bell by the ball, squeezing hands together.
tips: Keep elbows pinned to sides.

name: See-Saw Press
instructions: Double KB. As one goes up, the other comes down.
tips: Create a rhythm. Keep core tight.

name: Front Raise
instructions: Lift bell with straight arms to shoulder height.
tips: No swinging. Control the down phase.

name: Kneeling Halo
instructions: Perform halos while in a half-kneeling or tall-kneeling position.
tips: Challenge core stability. Don't wobble.

name: Plank Drag
instructions: In plank, drag the bell from side to side under body.
tips: Anti-rotation. Hips still.

name: Figure 8 Lunge
instructions: Lunge and pass the bell under the lead leg.
tips: Keep chest up while passing.

name: Good Morning
instructions: Hold bell at chest or on back. Hinge hips back with slight knee bend.
tips: Feel hamstrings stretch. Flat back.

name: Pull-Over
instructions: Lie on back. Lower bell behind head with slightly bent arms, pull back to chest.
tips: Keep ribs down. Engage lats.

name: Upright Row
instructions: Pull bell vertically close to body towards chin.
tips: Elbows higher than hands at top.

name: Viking Push Press
instructions: Push Press where you keep dipping and driving rhythmically.
tips: Use the legs heavily.

name: Pry Squat
instructions: In bottom of squat, push knees out with elbows and rock gently.
tips: Open the hips.

name: Split Squat
instructions: Stationary lunge. Up and down in split stance.
tips: Vertical torso.

name: Around the World
instructions: Pass bell around the body in a circle.
tips: Tight core. Don't let weight pull you.

name: Tactical Swing
instructions: Swing switching hands at the top (Hand-to-Hand).
tips: Smooth transition.

name: Close Grip Floor Press
instructions: Floor press holding the bell by the ball with both hands.
tips: Focus on triceps.

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Hold bell overhead. Lower behind head bending elbows.
tips: Elbows point forward/up, not out.

name: Hamstring Stretch
instructions: Basic stretch for back of thigh.
tips: Breathe into the tension.

name: Arm Bar
instructions: Lying on side, arm vertical with bell. Rotate hips towards floor.
tips: Stabilize shoulder. Keep eye on bell.

name: Bottom-Up Hold
instructions: Hold bell upside down in rack or press position.
tips: Grip strength focus.

name: Frog Pump
instructions: Glute bridge with soles of feet touching and knees out.
tips: Pump hips fast. Chin tucked.

name: Hip Flexor Stretch
instructions: Half kneeling. Tuck pelvis and lean slightly forward.
tips: Squeeze glute of trailing leg.

name: 90/90 Switch
instructions: Sitting with legs in 90/90 angles. Rotate hips to switch sides.
tips: Try to do it without hands.

name: Towel Curl
instructions: Loop towel through handle. Curl holding the towel ends.
tips: Hammer grip. Squeeze at top.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Press rotating palms from facing you to facing away.
tips: Smooth rotation.

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Raise light bells to the side to shoulder height.
tips: Lead with elbows.

name: Step-Up
instructions: Step onto a box/bench driving through the top leg.
tips: Control the way down.

name: Jefferson Curl
instructions: Stand on box. Roll spine down vertebrae by vertebrae with light weight.
tips: Go slow. Do not force range.

name: Cat-Cow
instructions: Quadruped. Arch back up, then sink belly down.
tips: Move with breath.

name: Squeeze Press
instructions: Press two bells while pushing them together hard.
tips: Constant inward tension.

name: Diamond Push-up
instructions: Push-up with hands close together forming a diamond.
tips: Tricep focus.

name: Pendlay Row
instructions: Bent over row starting from dead stop on floor each rep.
tips: Explosive pull. Strict back angle.

name: Slingshot
instructions: Pass KB around body while keeping hips steady.
tips: Similar to Around the World.

name: Tactical Lunge
instructions: Lunge backwards and pass the bell under the front leg to the other hand.
tips: Coordination key. Keep chest up.

name: Half Snatch
instructions: Snatch up, but lower to rack position before dropping.
tips: Easier on the grip than full snatch.

name: American Swing
instructions: Swing the bell all the way overhead.
tips: Careful with shoulder mobility. Don't overextend back.

name: Supported Row
instructions: Row with hand on bench or knee for support.
tips: Isolate the lat.

name: Double Jerk
instructions: Jerk with two bells.
tips: Requires good mobility.

name: Double Clean
instructions: Clean two bells at once.
tips: Wide stance.

name: Double Snatch
instructions: Snatch two bells at once.
tips: Advanced move. Wide stance.
